content: भगवत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Glorious, illustrious. {@--2@} Revered, venerable, divine, holy. (an epithet applied to gods, demigods and other holy or respectable personages); अथ भगवान् कुशली काश्यपः <ls>Ś. 5</ls>; भगवन्परवानयं जनः <ls>R. 8. 81</ls>: so भगवान् वासुदेवः &c. {@--3@} Fortunate (<ab>Ved.</ab>). {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} god, A deity. {@--2@} An epithet of Viṣṇu. {@--3@} Of Śiva. {@--4@} Of Jina. {@--5@} Of Buddha.
